participant_1.background:
I have my number and my freedom.
I enjoy watching my favorite childhood cartoons.
I like to watch YouTube videos of other people barbecuing while I eat my food in the car.
I am trying to improve my relationships with the people I love.
i listen to podcasts.

participant_2.background:
I come from a small town in the Midwest, where I grew up fishing and learning about animals.
i got married to my highschool friend.
i am a lesbian.
I enjoy trying new ethnic foods with my friends from out of town.
i still love to line dry my clothes.

content.text: I love listening to "The Adventure Zone" podcast! It is about a group of friends who play Dungeons and Dragons.
I have never played D&D, but I have heard good things about it. Do you play any other games?
I used to play video games a lot, but I don't have as much time anymore. I still like to watch people play video games on YouTube.
I love watching YouTube videos too! I love watching cooking shows and learning new recipes.
I love cooking too! I like trying new ethnic foods. I have a friend from out of town who is going to come over for dinner this weekend.
That sounds fun! I love trying new foods too. I have never been to the Midwest, but I have heard that there is a lot of great food there.
The Midwest is a great place to live! There are a lot of small towns with a lot of character.
I think I would like to live in a small town. I love the peace and quiet.
The peace and quiet is great, but you do have to drive a long way to get to the grocery store!
That is true. I guess you have to choose your priorities!
